title: 303. Why Larry Summers Is the Economist Everyone Hates to Love
description: He's been U.S. Treasury Secretary, a chief economist for the Obama White House and the World Bank, and president of Harvard. He's one of the most brilliant economists of his generation (and perhaps the most irascible). And he thinks the Trump Administration is wrong on just about everything.
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
